verses.verse: I, <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> the <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3870>entreat<s%> you to <S%G4043>walk<s%> in a <S%G516>manner<s%> <S%G516>worthy<s%> of the <S%G2821>calling<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> you have been <S%G2564>called,<s%>

with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5012>humility<s%> and <S%G4240>gentleness,<s%> with <S%G3115>patience,<s%> <S%G430>showing<s%> <S%G430>forbearance<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> in <S%G26>love,<s%>
being <S%G4704>diligent<s%> to <S%G5083>preserve<s%> the <S%G1775>unity<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> in the <S%G4886>bond<s%> of <S%G1515>peace.<s%>

[There is] <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G2532>also<s%> you were <S%G2564>called<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> of your <S%G2821>calling;<s%>
<S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G908>baptism,<s%>
<S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> and <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> and in <S%G3956>all.<s%>
But to <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of us <S%G5485>grace<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of Christ's <S%G1431>gift.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> it <S%G3004>says,<s%> "When He <S%G305>ascended<s%> on <S%G5311>high,<s%> He <S%G162>led<s%> <S%G162>captive<s%> a <S%G161>host<s%> of <S%G161>captives,<s%> And He <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1390>gifts<s%> to <S%G444>men.<s%>"

<S%G1161>(Now<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> [expression,] "He <S%G305>ascended,<s%>" <S%G5101>what<s%> does it <S%G1510>mean<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> that He <S%G2532>also<s%> had <S%G2597>descended<s%> into the <S%G2737>lower<s%> <S%G3313>parts<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>?

He who <S%G2597>descended<s%> is <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> He who <S%G305>ascended<s%> <S%G5231>far<s%> <S%G5231>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens,<s%> that He might <S%G4137>fill<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things.<s%>)

And He <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G3588>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> [as] <S%G652>apostles,<s%> and <S%G3588>some<s%> [as] <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and <S%G3588>some<s%> [as] <S%G2099>evangelists,<s%> and <S%G3588>some<s%> [as] <S%G4166>pastors<s%> and <S%G1320>teachers,<s%>
for the <S%G2677>equipping<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> for the <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G1248>service,<s%> to the <S%G3619>building<s%> up of the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

<S%G3360>until<s%> we <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2658>attain<s%> to the <S%G1775>unity<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and of the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> to a <S%G5046>mature<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> to the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of the <S%G2244>stature<s%> which belongs to the <S%G4138>fulness<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

As a <S%G2443>result,<s%> we are <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G3371>longer<s%> to be <S%G3516>children,<s%> <S%G2831>tossed<s%> <S%G2831>here<s%> and <S%G2831>there<s%> by <S%G2831>waves,<s%> and <S%G4064>carried<s%> <S%G4064>about<s%> by <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G417>wind<s%> of <S%G1319>doctrine,<s%> by the <S%G2940>trickery<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> by <S%G3834>craftiness<s%> in <S%G4106>deceitful<s%> <S%G3180>scheming;<s%>

but <S%G226>speaking<s%> the <S%G226>truth<s%> in <S%G26>love,<s%> we are to <S%G837>grow<s%> up in <S%G3956>all<s%> [aspects] into Him, <S%G3739>who<s%> is the <S%G2776>head,<s%> [even] <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

from <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> being <S%G4883>fitted<s%> and <S%G4822>held<s%> <S%G4822>together<s%> <S%G4883><s%> by that which <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G860>joint<s%> <S%G2024>supplies,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3358>proper<s%> <S%G1753>working<s%> of <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1520>individual<s%> <S%G3313>part,<s%> <S%G4160>causes<s%> the <S%G838>growth<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%> for the <S%G3619>building<s%> up of <S%G1438>itself<s%> in <S%G26>love.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and <S%G3143>affirm<s%> <S%G1722>together<s%> with the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that you <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G3371>longer<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4043>walk,<s%> in the <S%G3153>futility<s%> of their <S%G3563>mind,<s%>

<S%G1510>being<s%> <S%G4656>darkened<s%> in their <S%G1271>understanding,<s%> <S%G526>excluded<s%> from the <S%G2222>life<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G52>ignorance<s%> that is in them, <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G4457>hardness<s%> of their <S%G2588>heart;<s%>

and they, having <S%G524>become<s%> <S%G524>callous,<s%> have <S%G3860>given<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G3860>over<s%> to <S%G766>sensuality,<s%> for the <S%G2039>practice<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>kind<s%> of <S%G167>impurity<s%> with <S%G4124>greediness.<s%>
But you did not <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> in <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>way,<s%>
<S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1065>indeed<s%> you have <S%G191>heard<s%> Him and have been <S%G1321>taught<s%> in Him, <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G225>truth<s%> is in <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

that, in <S%G2596>reference<s%> to your <S%G4387>former<s%> <S%G391>manner<s%> of <S%G391>life,<s%> you <S%G659>lay<s%> <S%G659>aside<s%> the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G444>self,<s%> which is being <S%G5351>corrupted<s%> in <S%G2596>accordance<s%> with the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of <S%G539>deceit,<s%>
and that you be <S%G365>renewed<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of your <S%G3563>mind,<s%>

and <S%G1746>put<s%> on the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G444>self,<s%> which in [the likeness of] <S%G2316>God<s%> has been <S%G2936>created<s%> in <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> and <S%G3742>holiness<s%> of the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore,<s%> <S%G659>laying<s%> <S%G659>aside<s%> <S%G5579>falsehood,<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> [of you,] with his <S%G4139>neighbor,<s%> for we are <S%G3196>members<s%> of <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>
Be <S%G3710>angry,<s%> and [yet] do not <S%G264>sin;<s%> do not let the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G1931>go<s%> <S%G1931>down<s%> on your <S%G3950>anger,<s%>
and do not <S%G1325>give<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> an <S%G5117>opportunity.<s%>

Let him who <S%G2813>steals<s%> <S%G2813>steal<s%> <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G3371>longer;<s%> but <S%G3123>rather<s%> let him <S%G2872>labor,<s%> <S%G2038>performing<s%> with his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G18>what<s%> is <S%G18>good,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that he may <S%G2192>have<s%> [something] to <S%G3330>share<s%> with him who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5532>need.<s%>

Let <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4550>unwholesome<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> from your <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> but <S%G1487>only<s%> <S%G5100>such<s%> [a word] as is <S%G18>good<s%> for <S%G3619>edification<s%> according to the <S%G5532>need<s%> [of the moment,] that it may <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G191>hear.<s%>
And do not <S%G3076>grieve<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> by <S%G3739>whom<s%> you were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> for the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G629>redemption.<s%>

Let <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4088>bitterness<s%> and <S%G2372>wrath<s%> and <S%G3709>anger<s%> and <S%G2906>clamor<s%> and <S%G988>slander<s%> be <S%G142>put<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> from you, <S%G4862>along<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2549>malice.<s%>

And be <S%G5543>kind<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> tender-hearted, <S%G5483>forgiving<s%> <S%G1438>each<s%> <S%G1438>other,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> has <S%G5483>forgiven<s%> you.
